rapidChange.title: Rapid Climate Change
rapidChange.sectionDesc: Alert when temperature or humidity changes rapidly, indicating open windows, HVAC issues, or other problems.
rapidChange.tempThresholdDesc: Minimum temperature change to trigger alert
rapidChange.tempWindowDesc: Time period for temperature change detection
rapidChange.humidityThresholdDesc: Minimum humidity change to trigger alert
rapidChange.humidityWindowDesc: Time period for humidity change detection

openTooLong.sectionDesc: Alert when doors, windows, or garages are left open beyond these thresholds.
openTooLong.doorThresholdDesc: Alert after door is open this long
openTooLong.windowThresholdDesc: Alert after window is open this long
openTooLong.garageThresholdDesc: Alert after garage is open this long
openTooLong.roofWindowThresholdDesc: Alert after roof window is open this long
openTooLong.coverThresholdDesc: Alert after cover is open this long
openTooLong.lockThresholdDesc: Alert after lock is unlocked this long

errors.activate_in_admin: Enable media players in admin area
errors.no_cards_configured: No cards configured. Configure cards in the admin area under "Floor Cards".
errors.no_lights_enabled: No lights enabled in admin configuration.
errors.no_windows_enabled: No windows enabled in admin configuration.

setup.wizardIntro: Run the guided setup wizard to configure your dashboard step by step.
setup.wizardDesc: The setup wizard guides you through configuring floors, rooms, entities, and dashboard layout. Your existing settings will be preserved.

entities.title: Entities
entities.description: Configure label mappings and enable entities for each room.
entities.labelConfigDesc: Map your Home Assistant labels to DashView categories. Each category needs a label to automatically assign entities.
entities.roomConfigDesc: Enable rooms and configure which entities appear in each room. Only enabled rooms will be shown.
entities.noAreas: No areas configured in Home Assistant.
entities.noAreasHint: Go to Settings → Areas & Zones to create areas.
entities.noLabelsHint: Create labels in Home Assistant first: Settings → Labels → Create Label
entities.labelsHint: After configuring labels, go to the Rooms tab to enable specific entities for each room.
entities.createLabelsHint: Create labels in Home Assistant first: Settings → Labels → Create Label
entities.createLabelsThenAssign: Then assign labels to your entities and come back here to configure the mapping
entities.entitiesTabDescription: Configure label mappings and enable entities for each room.
entities.roomConfigTabDesc: Enable rooms and configure which entities appear on the dashboard. Click a room to expand and toggle individual devices.

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: Configure floor and room order, and set up floor overview cards.
layout.floorOrderDesc: Drag and drop to reorder floors and rooms. Changes are saved automatically.
layout.floorCardsDesc: Configure which cards appear on each floor's overview page.
layout.noFloorsHint: Create areas in Home Assistant and assign them to floors in room configuration.
layout.cardConfigDesc: Configure which cards appear on the Home dashboard and customize their settings.
layout.ventilationWarningDesc: Show a ventilation warning in room popups when temperature or humidity exceeds these thresholds.
layout.temperatureThresholdDesc: Show notification when temperature is above this value
layout.humidityThresholdDesc: Show notification when humidity is above this value
layout.weatherCardDesc: Select the weather entity for the header and weather popup. All forecast data will be fetched from this entity.
layout.garbageCardDesc: Search and add sensor entities to display upcoming garbage pickup dates. The card shows in the Big 2 position.
layout.noSensorsAddedHint: Use the search above to find and add garbage pickup sensors
layout.displayOnFloorDesc: Select which floor should show the garbage card in the Big 2 (bottom-left) position.
layout.displayOnFloorDescShort: Select which floor should show the garbage card in the Bottom Right position.
layout.infoTextAreaDesc: Configure which status messages appear in the info text area below the header.
layout.customLabelsDesc: Enable custom labels to show their entities in room configuration. Custom labels are user-defined labels beyond the standard types (lights, covers, etc.). Entities with enabled labels can have related child entities linked to them.
layout.noCustomLabelsFound: No custom labels found in Home Assistant.
layout.noCustomLabelsHint: Create labels in Settings → Labels to organize your entities.
layout.layoutConfigDesc: Configure the display order of floors and rooms, and assign entities to floor card slots.
layout.floorCardSlotsDesc: Configure which entities appear on each floor's card grid. Click a slot to select an entity.
layout.floorOverviewSubtitle: Swipeable card showing all rooms on this floor
layout.noMatchingIcons: No matching icons found in quick select list
layout.noRoomsAssigned: No rooms assigned to this floor.
layout.noFloorsConfigured: No floors configured in Home Assistant
layout.noFloorsConfiguredHint: Go to Settings → Areas & Zones → Floors to create floors
layout.configureFloorsFirst: Configure floors first to order rooms
layout.iconPlaceholder: Enter icon name (e.g., mdi:coffee) or search...
layout.displayLocationHint: Select a room to show this button in the room popup, or leave empty for main page.
layout.lowBatteryDesc: Alert on low device battery levels

weather.title: Weather
weather.description: Configure weather display and DWD warnings.
weather.weatherEntityDesc: Select your Home Assistant weather entity for forecast display.
weather.dwdWarningsDesc: Configure German Weather Service (DWD) warning sensors to display alerts.
weather.weatherConfigDesc: Configure weather display and climate notification thresholds.
weather.weatherEntityDesc2: Select the weather entity for the header and weather popup. All forecast data will be fetched from this entity.
weather.noWeatherEntitiesDesc: Install a weather integration in Home Assistant to display forecasts
weather.noWeatherEntitiesHint: Supported integrations: OpenWeatherMap, Met.no, AccuWeather, etc.
weather.dwdWarningsSubtitle: German weather warnings from Deutscher Wetterdienst (DWD).
weather.weatherRadarDesc: Configure the weather radar map displayed in the weather popup. Uses Windy.com embed.

pollen.title: Pollen Forecast
pollen.description: Configure DWD Pollenflug sensors to display pollen levels.
pollen.noSensorsHint: Install the DWD Pollenflug integration via HACS to display pollen levels.
pollen.displayModeDesc: How to show pollen in weather popup

status.title: Status
status.description: Configure status display, info texts, and media presets.
status.infoTextDesc: Enable or disable status information displayed in the header.
status.mediaPresetsDesc: Configure quick action buttons for music and media control.
status.notificationsDesc: Configure which appliance notifications to display.
status.playlistsHint: Add playlists to show quick-select buttons in the media player
status.houseInfoDesc: Configure status information that appears in the info text area below the header.
status.quickStatusItemsDesc: Toggle status messages that appear in the info text area below the header.
status.garbageCardDesc: Search and add sensor entities to display upcoming garbage pickup dates.
status.noSensorsAddedHint: Use the search above to find and add garbage pickup sensors
status.displayOnFloorDesc: Select which floor should show the garbage card in the Bottom Right position.
status.trainDeparturesDesc: Configure train departure times to display based on location or conditions.
status.trainSchedulesDesc: Add train departure sensors. Each can have a condition to show only when relevant (e.g., when you're at home or near a station).
status.noTrainDeparturesHint: Use the search above to find and add departure sensors
status.mediaPlaylistsDesc: Configure playlists to show in the media player popup. Add Spotify, Apple Music, or other media URIs.
status.playlistsDesc: Add playlists that appear as quick-select buttons in the media player popup. Use Spotify URIs (e.g., spotify:playlist:xxxxx) or other media content IDs.
status.coverImagePlaceholder: Leave empty for auto-fetch, or paste custom URL
status.spotifyAutoFetch: Spotify artwork is fetched automatically. Only set this to override.
status.nonSpotifyHint: For non-Spotify sources, paste an image URL here.
status.houseNotificationsDesc: Configure climate notifications and alerts for rooms.
status.roomClimateNotificationsDesc: Show a ventilation warning in room popups when temperature or humidity exceeds these thresholds.

scenes.title: Scenes & Actions
scenes.description: Configure quick action buttons and custom entity labels.
scenes.sceneButtonsDesc: Configure quick action buttons. Global buttons appear on the main page, room buttons appear in room popups.
scenes.noButtonsHint: Add buttons to quickly trigger scenes, scripts, or services
scenes.globalButtonsDesc: Buttons displayed on the main status page.
scenes.roomButtonsDesc: Buttons displayed in specific room popups.
scenes.customLabelsDesc: Override default labels for specific entities.
scenes.scenesDesc: Configure quick action buttons and custom entity labels.

users.title: Users & Settings
users.description: Configure user photos and language preferences.
users.noUsersHint: Add person entities in Home Assistant to configure their photos here.
users.languageDesc: Choose the display language for Dashview. By default, it follows your Home Assistant language setting.
users.photosDesc: Upload custom profile photos for each person entity.
users.setupWizardDesc: Re-run the guided setup wizard to reconfigure Dashview from scratch.

confirmation.deleteSceneMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the scene button "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
confirmation.disableAllMessage: This will disable {count} entities in this room. You can re-enable them individually.
confirmation.resetDefaultsMessage: This will reset all settings to their default values. Your current configuration will be lost.

suggestions.unusedLights: {{name}} has {{count}} lights that are not enabled
suggestions.unusedTemperature: {{name}} has temperature sensors that could be enabled

entityTypes.lockDesc: Lock entities for doors and gates

infoTextToggles.lightsDesc: Shows number of lights turned on

draft.discardMessage: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?

security.noWindowsEnabled: No windows enabled in admin configuration.
security.noGaragesEnabled: No garage doors enabled in admin configuration.
security.noMotionEnabled: No motion sensors enabled in admin configuration.

changes.dashboard: Clear dashboard for all rooms and floors
changes.quick_access: Quick access to lights, covers and climate devices
changes.weather_header: Weather display with forecast in header
changes.drag_drop: Sort rooms and floors via drag & drop
changes.use_labels: Use labels to automatically assign devices
changes.tv_room_popup: Show and control TVs in room popups
changes.tv_status: TV status in overview ("X TVs on")
changes.rooms_visible: All rooms and devices visible immediately after installation
changes.new_devices_auto: New devices with labels are automatically enabled
changes.garbage_floor_fixed: Garbage calendar floor selection works again
changes.devices_popup: Devices are now displayed correctly in room popup
changes.status_header: Status display in header works again (lights on, etc.)
changes.floor_order: Floor and room order is retained after reload
changes.devices_loaded: All enabled devices are loaded correctly
changes.overview_settings: Floor overview and card settings are retained
changes.activity_indicators: Floor and room activity indicators show active rooms
changes.chips_popup: Chips in room popup are displayed correctly
changes.lights_counting: Lights counting and status works again
changes.entity_id: Entity ID is shown in room configuration
changes.cache_update: Browser cache is automatically updated after updates
changes.tv_layout: TV section in room popup now has same layout as lights
changes.device_name: Device name is shown under entity name in room configuration
changes.security_tab: Security tab now shows all windows, garages and motion sensors
changes.long_press_details: Long press on light opens details dialog
changes.short_tap: Short tap still toggles the light
changes.settings_reload: Settings are no longer overwritten on reload
changes.tv_display: TV section in room popup is displayed correctly

wizard.title: Setup Wizard
wizard.subtitle: Let's get Dashview configured for your home
wizard.stepPlaceholder: Step content will be implemented here.

welcome.title: Welcome to Dashview!
welcome.subtitle: Your new smart home dashboard for Home Assistant. Let's set it up together.
welcome.feature1Desc: A clean, intuitive dashboard designed for touch screens and wall tablets.
welcome.feature2Desc: Organize your rooms by floor for easy navigation throughout your home.
welcome.feature3Desc: Automatically discover and map your entities to rooms based on Home Assistant areas.
welcome.feature4Desc: Control lights, covers, and devices with simple taps and swipes.

floorOrder.title: Arrange Your Floors
floorOrder.description: Drag to reorder floors. This determines the display order on your dashboard.
floorOrder.empty: No floors found in Home Assistant.
floorOrder.emptyHint: Create floors in Home Assistant under Settings → Areas & Zones → Floors.
floorOrder.hint: Tip: The first floor in the list will be the default view on your dashboard.

roomOrder.title: Arrange Room Order
roomOrder.description: Drag to reorder rooms within each floor. This determines how rooms appear on the dashboard.
roomOrder.empty: No rooms found in Home Assistant.
roomOrder.emptyHint: Create areas and assign them to floors in Home Assistant.
roomOrder.noRooms: No rooms assigned to this floor
roomOrder.hint: Tip: Rooms appear in this order within each floor view.

labels.title: Set Up Your Labels
labels.description: Map your Home Assistant labels to Dashview categories. Only entities with labels that are assigned to rooms will appear on your dashboard.
labels.empty: No labels configured in Home Assistant
labels.hint: Tip: Create labels in Home Assistant under Settings → Labels, then assign them to your entities

roomConfig.title: Configure Your Rooms
roomConfig.description: Enable or disable rooms to show on your dashboard.
roomConfig.empty: No rooms found in Home Assistant.
roomConfig.emptyHint: Create areas in Home Assistant under Settings → Areas & Zones.
roomConfig.hint: Tip: Only enabled rooms will appear on your dashboard. You can change this later in Admin settings.

floorCards.title: Configure Floor Cards
floorCards.description: Choose which overview cards to display for each floor on your dashboard.
floorCards.noFloorsHint: Go back and set up floors first.
floorCards.hint: Tip: Floor overview cards show quick summaries like lights on, temperature, or security status.

review.title: Review Your Setup
review.description: Here's a summary of your configuration. Click Edit to make changes.
review.readyDesc: Click Finish to complete setup and start using your dashboard.

windows.empty: No windows enabled in admin configuration.

garages.empty: No garage doors enabled in admin configuration.

motion.empty: No motion sensors enabled in admin configuration.

doors.empty: No door sensors enabled in admin configuration.

onboarding.title: Setup Wizard
onboarding.subtitle: Let's get Dashview configured for your home
onboarding.stepPlaceholder: Step content will be implemented here.

welcome.title: Welcome to Dashview!
welcome.subtitle: Your new smart home dashboard for Home Assistant. Let's set it up together.
welcome.feature1Desc: A clean, intuitive dashboard designed for touch screens and wall tablets.
welcome.feature2Desc: Organize your rooms by floor for easy navigation throughout your home.
welcome.feature3Desc: Control lights, covers, and devices with simple taps and swipes.
welcome.feature4Desc: View current weather and forecasts directly on your dashboard.

floors.title: Set Up Floors
floors.desc: Create floors for your home and drag to reorder them.
floors.empty: No floors yet. Add your first floor above to get started.
floors.placeholder: Enter floor name (e.g. Ground Floor, Upper Floor)
floors.minRequired: At least one floor is required to continue.
floors.cannotDeleteLast: The last floor cannot be deleted
floors.confirmDeleteMessage: Do you really want to delete
floors.confirmDeleteWarning: This floor has {count} assigned rooms. They will become unassigned.
floors.errorCreate: Could not create floor. Please try again.
floors.errorDelete: Could not delete floor. Please try again.
floors.errorDeleteLast: The last floor cannot be deleted.
floors.hint: Tip: Drag floors to set the display order on your dashboard. Common names: Ground Floor, Upper Floor, Basement, Attic.

rooms.title: Assign Rooms to Floors
rooms.desc: Assign each room (area) to a floor. Use the dropdown to change.
rooms.empty: No areas found in Home Assistant. Create areas under Settings → Areas & Zones.
rooms.noRooms: No rooms assigned to this floor
rooms.hint: Tip: You can also manage areas in Home Assistant under Settings → Areas & Zones

entities.title: Select Devices
entities.desc: Choose devices for your dashboard. Devices are grouped by room.
entities.hint: Tip: Suggested devices (lights, climate, covers) are pre-selected for convenience

layout.title: Arrange Floor Cards
layout.desc: Set the display order of floor cards on the dashboard.
layout.noFloors: No floors configured. Go back to add floors.
layout.hint: You can change the order later in the Admin area under Layout.

weather.title: Weather Display
weather.desc: Choose a weather entity to show forecasts on the dashboard.
weather.optional: Optional — you can skip this step
weather.noWeather: Don't show weather on the dashboard
weather.noEntities: No weather entities found. Install a weather integration in Home Assistant.

review.title: Review Setup
review.desc: Here's a summary of your configuration. You can edit any section before finishing.
review.readyDesc: Your dashboard is configured and ready to use.
